MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH10 EH13 and EH14 postcode areas of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:25pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate and repair the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  12:19AM on Monday, 08 February 2021.
